original_title: Carpool Karaoke: When Corden Met McCartney Live From Liverpool
overview: James Corden's Carpool Karaoke with Paul McCartney brought on an unprecedented response from audiences, racking up more than 30 million views on YouTube in just two months. This feature, which is more than double the length of the 23-minute original, aired on Aug. 20 2019 on CBS.
title: Carpool Karaoke: When Corden Met McCartney Live From Liverpool
